-- Step 1: Schema Discovery
SELECT
  n.nspname AS schema_name,
  c.relname AS table_name,
  CASE c.relkind
    WHEN 'r' THEN 'table'
    WHEN 'm' THEN 'materialized_view'
  END AS table_type,
  d.table_comment
FROM pg_class c
JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
CROSS JOIN LATERAL (SELECT obj_description(c.oid, 'pg_class') AS table_comment) d
WHERE n.nspname = 'public'
  AND c.relkind IN ('r','m')
  AND d.table_comment IS NOT NULL
  AND trim(d.table_comment) <> ''
ORDER BY c.relname;
```
